title: Samsung Galaxy S6 Exynos chip benchmarked | Trusted Reviews
description: ![Samsung Galaxy S5tight]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * It’s worth noting that it is likely that Samsung will also release aSnapdragon 810-fuelled Galaxy S6 variant too.**Related:** [](https://www.trustedreviews.com/hubs/mwc-2015)[MWC 2015: Whatto expect from the Barcelona expo](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/sony-xperia-z4-may-miss-mwc-2015)Another point to note is that the benchmark listed memory as 2873MB, whichmeans there’s a 3GB RAM module on board.This is in contrast to earlier rumours that [suggested we’d be seeing 4GB ofmemory](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/samsung-galaxy-s6-edge-to-boast-4gb-of-ram-say-analysts) with the Galaxy S6.Of course, Samsung could very easily switch out to a bigger-capacity RAMmodule at a later date.Whatever the case, we’re likely to find out what the Galaxy S6 proper has instore for us around the time of Mobile World Congress 2015, which runs fromMarch 2 to 5.
